trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Virginia Beach
There were no other sightings in Virginia Beach on or around May 20th 2013
divs: sighting detailson may 20, 2013 i was out in my backyard with my dog, thought i saw something in the vapor trails, went in to get my camera. i then saw 2 airplanes crossing each other and decided to video tape them. first following to the right and then to the left. this was at 7:52pm eastern time. within an hour later i uploaded the video to my computer and played it back and when i did i was very surprised to see 3 dark\black spheres in a triangle formation, to me it appeared they came out of the vapor trail from the north\nw and went to the east. the airplane was in view the entire time. the ufo came into view at 30 seconds into the video and lasted only 5 seconds, it was all very quick. however, as i watched the video the spheres seemed to move as one and it appeared to have almost a translucent center, with the 3 dark spheres forming the outer triangle.
Summary: video taping airplane vapor trails and caught ufo in footage, noticed after looking at the video.
